mapper.select:
SELECT T.A100 as bzh, T.A298 as zwmc, T.A302 as ywmc, T.A101 as fbrq, T.A205 as ssrq, T.A305 as ys, T.A200 as zt FROM STANDARDWC T WHERE 1=1
AND T.A006 = #{bzzz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND ( T.A100 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{a100_1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR T.A100 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{a100_2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )
AND T.A298 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
AND T.A006 IN (SELECT orgcode FROM ORG_ALL WHERE leibie = #{leibie,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND T.A200 IN
#{item}
ORDER BY T.A007*1 ASC
